title: League of Lag?
body:
Good Day Riot,

I am a South African LoL player, I am an avid player and play everyday or at least I used to until  Monday evening when I got home, logged in and tried to play a game... my Ping was a 100ms higher than it normally is and the packet loss is more like what packet? This problem is being experienced by numerous other South African LoL players who just want to have some fun and not pull their hair out when they die from a 5 man gank that was invisible till just after they died 

Any assistance or light you could shed on this matter would be most appreciated. 

PLS FIX, RITO {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If you're playing on OCE then, unfortunately the problem problem lies with your ISP's upstream. They are limited number of sub-sea cables connection Africa to Australia (only one via SE Asia), and when that breaks, you'll get routed via EU. Hence the high pings.

Have you tried playing on EUW instead?
